summary:
final version facegen to skyrim and skyrim to facegen

massive improved
descriptionHtml:
added rases, chargen male and female.
texture heavy improved
produces a texture and mesh pretty much gameready
photofit
texture can also be altered thought facegen on all models ;)
now facegen and skyrim modifiers works togheter u can freely shape u face as u want just like old time oblivion ;)
huge noses tiny tiny mouths

and read readme! importent

and u can just drop additinal skyrims tri files in this instal folder and u get acces to the modifier
but not facegen

requirement
Facegen! preferly the payed regged one so u can export the stuff u do

installation


with newest facegen the folder to instal is here

C:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Roaming\\FaceGen\\Modeller3\\ModelSets

other versions of facegen

C:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Local\\VirtualStore\\Program Files (x86)\\Singular Inversions\\FaceGen Modeller 3.1

or here

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Singular Inversions\\FaceGen Modeller 3.5

choose the one that fits


Issues

uv map when export

model postion when export


steps to take after exporting your head


1.just import the head into blender or 3d max, import vanilla head skinned and skeleton ,align your head so it matches vanillahead in postition,neck needs to be in exact postion. 
2.open texture in photoshop(improve it iv u want), flip it vertical! save as dds
[color=\"#2E8B57\"](now optinal a more advanced step.
open normal map from default head, add it as layer under your texture
scale move copy paste, edit ure image so eye postion matches normal map, u might want to it with mouth to,remove eyebrow)[/color]
3.apply uv map and flip it vertical or horisontal or both until it fit
4. skinwrap(copy the skin),add new  bsdismember(part head)  and export to nif.
5.open vanillahead in nifskope
6.open ure new nif (that u exported)in nifskope, replace shader with vanillaheadshader.
7. save nif
8.done!
each model took about 20 hours to make so a ENDORSEMENT would be more the welcome to work
and it will kep me inpired to inprovee this mod


Have fun ;)

your therus

Troubleshouting
if facegen wont load up after added the mod just rename the mod to
csamskyrim work  this can happen if u use newset version of facegen and this mod path
C:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Roaming\\FaceGen\\Modeller3\\ModelSets
author: theru
